description: Versatile text component for displaying paragraphs, headings, labels, and inline text. Supports semantic HTML tags through 'as' prop for proper document structure and accessibility.
useCase: Use for body text, headings (h1-h6), labels, captions, quotes, and any textual content. Critical for content hierarchy and SEO.

props.content: Our platform helps you scale efficiently with enterprise-grade tools.

as.description: HTML tag to render (p, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, span, label, etc.)

id.description: Unique identifier for the text element

automation.semanticRole: Display text content with semantic HTML tags
automation.note: Text elements are read-only and non-interactive. Use appropriate 'as' prop for document structure.
